## calculateGradientColor(score) â‡’ <code>string</code>
Calculates a color by interpolating between a cold and hot color based on the score.

**Kind**: global function  
**Returns**: <code>string</code> - - The calculated RGB color string.  

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| score | <code>number</code> | The score from 0 to 100. |
